name: Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Majin Sonic (DEMO)
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Majin Sonic (DEMO)
description:
FUN IS INFINITE

In this mod, you play as Boyfriend while you try to beat Majin Sonic in all of his pixelated glory. Got what it takes?

FEATURES: Dialogue Cutscenes, "Endless" 8bit Cover, Character Reskin, and More!
